formalText: He had a title exam due yesterday that he kind of blew off.
He was wondering if he had had the medication if he would have done it or not.
He basically just fell asleep on the couch and never got out and finished the title, even waking up at 11 and was up for several hours.
And he's not really even anxious or stressed out about it.
He's kind of getting used to getting screwed over.
Same thing as last Friday, he's not as anxious.

He's kind of been thinking about that if he really does have ADD, how much different his life would have been if this had been discovered 30 years ago, 20 years ago, 10 years ago, 5 years ago, two years ago, a year ago, or 6 months ago.
So that was kind of bothering him a bit.
That's why he's wondering if the adderal works and how much that will change things.
So we'll see if he's productive tomorrow.
So Micah gave him a prescription for Adderall.
He could probably do better than the Klonopin.
That's why someone asked him if he had ever taken stimulants before, and he pauses, because he used to take ephedrine in college when it was legal.
